title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1260.7 - Permission to conduct sightseeing flights required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1260.7 - Permission to conduct sightseeing flights required

State Regulations

No person shall conduct sightseeing flights at any air
terminal except under permit from the Port Authority. By sightseeing flights is
meant flights on which passengers are carried for hire and which originate and
terminate at the same air terminal with no intermediate stops other than
emergency stops. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1260.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
